cluster_relations.rel_desc: The origins of urban legends are a topic situated within the broader field of modern folklore.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that an academic or scholarly field includes a given subject as one of its research topics.
remarks: Relation primarily created to capture that the research topic (origins of urban legends) is contextualized in modern folklore; semantics somewhat inferred.
Relation primarily created to capture that the research topic (origins of urban legends) is contextualized in modern folklore; semantics somewhat inferred.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: The origins of urban legends are located in the historical period referred to as ancient times.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the origins or beginnings of a phenomenon can be traced to a particular historical period or time span.
cluster_relations.object_class_label: Narrative Explanations of the Unknown and Historical Origins

qualifiers.ConditionExpression: when stories were used to explain the unknown

cluster_relations.rel_desc: The origins of urban legends are directly related to the question of the truth behind the stories.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates a non-causal, conceptual association between two ideas or domains.
remarks: Relation added to capture conceptual linkage between origin research and story truth.
Relation added to capture conceptual linkage between origin research and story truth.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: The origins of urban legends are linked to, and part of, the broader context of modern folklore.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that a subject is a research topic within a specified academic or scholarly field.

qualifiers.OtherQualifier: ResearchChallenge: tracing these origins is difficult

remarks: Association inferred from surrounding context; modern folklore is not explicitly named in the same sentence as origins.
Association inferred from surrounding context; modern folklore is not explicitly named in the same sentence as origins.
